channel.title: Rifle scope WIP
channel.description: Here is a current WIP for me...I still need to add the mount that attaches to the picatinny rail on guns, but here it is so far, will finish mount for rail(s) then have to make low poly, bake yaddaa yaddaa [URL=http://img227.imageshack.us/i/scope.png/][IMG]http://img227.imageshack.us/img227/882/scope.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: Rifle scope WIP
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Not too bad, you still got a bit to learn about TS though. I hope you know what floating geometry is and how to use it.

You should also base this off an actual scope
